column1: The Purple Pig////My bf and I ordered the crispy pig ears
column3: and octopus. The crispy pig ears were my favorite. They were super crispy
column4: mixed with crispy kale and an egg on top. The pickled peppers added a great kick to the dish. The octopus was my second favorite. It was tender and not chewy at all. The salsa verde was a great sauce with it as well as the fingerling potatoes. The bone marrow came with some grilled bread
